name: OLED for Instagram
description:
Works on the login, home, search, profile, and photos page, but not suited for the Edit Profile page.

Compatible with Chrome and Firefox.
additional_info:
When Instagram changes their naming schemes (again) I will try to release an update ASAP, but incase you notice something broken feel free to reach out on reddit: /u/woried

2016-08-11
 - Fixed Navigation bar, Follow buttons, and Footer link colours

2016-06-06
 - Long overdue update: rewrote entire CSS to be more clean now that they don't rely on data-reactid's
 - Minor bugs sure to be around, I'll push another update as they're found
 - Restored the navigation icons
 - Removed white borders around images & videos
 - Changed link color from default Blue to #999
 - Changed Activity drop down menu background color and borders
 - Brightened User Name links

2016-03-28
 - Updated video overlays
 - Checked for new Explore, Activity, and Profile sprites
 - Removed overlays on Explore page
 - Updated Follow Buttons
 - Fixed right click shield

2016-02-10
 - Fixed right click block over tagged images
 - Removed black background on the Animated Heart sprite

2016-02-09
 - Fixed new blackout layer over videos

2016-01-26
 - Fixed "double click to like" animation overlay from blacking out images.

2016-01-25
 - Initial release
